sentences.english: I love playing cards with Bob, because Ikill him every time.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡和鮑打牌，因爲我每回都贏他。

sentences.english: The Balds will go to Bangkok next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 鮑爾德一家下星期一要到曼谷去。

sentences.english: The digestive system of 45 day-old abalone Haliotis discus hannai Ino is studied by histological method.
sentences.chinese: 以組織學方法研究了45日齡皺紋盤鮑的消化系統。

sentences.english: Boswell wrote a famous biography of Dr. White.
sentences.chinese: 鮑斯韋爾爲懷特博士寫過一本著名傳記。

sentences.english: Claire Bowes reports on the sinking of the Rainbow Warrior.
sentences.chinese: 克萊爾鮑伊斯在“彩虹勇士號”的沉船處爲您報道。

sentences.english: Snowball and Napoleon were by far the most active in the debates.
sentences.chinese: 斯諾鮑和拿破崙是討論中最活躍的。

sentences.english: What about Pitney Bowes?They used to be in Stamford.
sentences.chinese: 皮德尼。鮑怎麼樣了？他們過去也在斯坦福德。

sentences.english: They'll probably soon forget about Borders as well.
sentences.chinese: 想必他們也會很快忘了鮑德斯。

sentences.english: Since escaping the Jingzhou catastrophe, I've been recuperating at Bao Hamlet.
sentences.chinese: 自荊州失陷，逃難在鮑家莊養病。

sentences.english: My teacher Mr. Bao is a little old and very humorous person. And he always wears glasses.
sentences.chinese: 鮑老師是個戴眼鏡，很幽默，也有點老的人。

sentences.english: In addition, the feature of the Bauschinger effect for large plastic deformation was revealed in this work.
sentences.chinese: 從實驗中同時得出大塑性變形鮑辛格效應的特徵。

sentences.english: The score stood four to two with but one inning more to play.
sentences.chinese: 四比二的比數，只場鮑最後一局的進攻。
奧斯汀在2008年離開布羅肯鮑。
“領到樓上去，”鮑先生告訴他說。

sentences.english: Why did Pope let Jackson get behind him?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼鮑博會讓傑克遜繞到他的後面？
